### _Sundials are not just for the garden any more..._

Have you ever seen an indoor rainbow sundial before? You're looking at one
right now!



The Spectra sundial is a custom-made indoor rainbow sundial that can be
enjoyed year round in any sunny spot. Unique among sundials, the Spectra
sundial earns its name by producing vivid prism beams, flooding the room with
intense rainbow color as it uses the sun to accurately tell the time of day.
As the sun moves across the sky, the Spectra sundial creates a slow motion
parade of bright rainbow colors moving through the room, sometimes three large
brilliant spectrum beams at a time.



The Spectra sundial is one of the most unique anniversary gifts available
anywhere, especially when personalized with a special inscription and date
line to celebrate the special day for years to come - then the tip of the time
shadow of the sundial will "ride the line" on the anniversary day each year.
You can even have a Spectra sundial made with custom date lines celebrating
family birthdays to create a future family heirloom, and it can be really fun
for family members to watch the time shadow getting closer and closer each day
to touching their special birthday date line each year!



Since it is "traditional" to give something made of paper for a first
anniversary gift, and the "modern" gift recommendation is to give a clock, you
can do both by giving a gift certificate for a Spectra sundial...then you can
work together to decide where in the home it should go and what you would like
it to say. A custom-made Spectra sundial is a creative anniversary gift idea
and makes a very colorful first anniversary or wedding clock that will
celebrate the special occasion every year for years to come.









In addition to accurately telling the time of day to within minutes, unlike
most mass-produced commercial online or garden center sundials, each of our
distinctive beveled glass sundials is a truly exquisite sun sculpture...an
exclusive upscale fine art piece that adds a colorful sense of rainbow energy
to any sunny room.



All Spectra sundials are individually handcrafted and personally signed by
designer Jim Tallman, making each Spectra sundial a truly unique one-of-a-kind
sculptural piece and perfect personalized rainbow gift idea for "the person
who has everything." The Spectra sundial has been in continual production
since 2002, and over those years Jim has shipped his sundials to customers all
over the world. Many of them have written back to him to express their
appreciation, and you can read some of the things they had to say on the
Spectra sundial comments page.



Corporate gift sundials can also be made with logos and inscriptions and can
be given as the perfect time service or retirement gift...and a custom-made
Spectra sundial can also make a wonderful housewarming gift for the upscale
client from an appreciative custom builder or real estate agent.









Retailing for $325.00 (US) and specially calculated, designed and handmade
specifically for each customer, the Spectra sundial is without a doubt one of
the best custom sundial values on the planet...as well as one of the most
unique personalized gifts you will ever find.



To learn more about the details of this unique bespoke sundial follow the
sundial links below to see how it works, what it looks like in the home, what
people are saying about it, and how to have one made just for you.





### _A great last minute personalized gift idea!_

You can instantly buy a sundial gift certificate that we will prepare and
email back to you. You can then print it out and give it to your special
recipient however you like, so that they can contact us and have their one-of-
a-kind personalized gift handcrafted exactly as they wish, whenever they are
ready.



The Spectra sundial gift certificate is the perfect rainbow gift to celebrate
a wedding, anniversary, birthday or new arrival...you can give them colorful
days and a gift they will enjoy for a lifetime.
